verses.verse: The <S%H9294>burden<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> [Thus] <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H5186>stretches<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> <S%H3245>lays<s%> the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3335>forms<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him,

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H9371>cup<s%> that causes <S%H7478>reeling<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> and when the <S%H4692>siege<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> it will <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H4614>heavy<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H6006>lift<s%> it will be <S%H8295>severely<s%> <S%H8295>injured.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

"In that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> with <S%H8541>bewilderment,<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> with <S%H7697>madness.<s%> But I will <S%H6491>watch<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> while I <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H5788>blindness.<s%>

"Then the <S%H441>clans<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> 'A <S%H556>strong<s%> <S%H556>support<s%> for us are the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> through the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>'

"In that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H441>clans<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> like a <S%H3595>firepot<s%> among pieces of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and a <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H3940>torch<s%> among <S%H5995>sheaves,<s%> so they will <S%H398>consume<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on the <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> while the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on their own <S%H8478>sites<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> may not be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

"In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1598>defend<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the one who is <S%H3782>feeble<s%> among them in that <S%H3117>day<s%> will be like <S%H1732>David,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> [will be] like <S%H430>God,<s%> like the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I will <S%H1245>set<s%> <S%H1245>about<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

"And I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> out on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> and of <S%H8469>supplication,<s%> so that they will <S%H5027>look<s%> on Me <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H1856>pierced;<s%> and they will <S%H5594>mourn<s%> for Him, as one <S%H5594>mourns<s%> for an <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H3173>son,<s%> and they will <S%H4843>weep<s%> <S%H4843>bitterly<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> Him, like the <S%H4843>bitter<s%> <S%H4843>weeping<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a first-born.

"In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will be <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H4553>mourning<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> like the <S%H4553>mourning<s%> of <S%H1910>Hadadrimmon<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo.<s%>

"And the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H5594>mourn,<s%> <S%H4940>every<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> by <S%H905>itself;<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> by <S%H905>itself,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> by <S%H905>themselves;<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> by <S%H905>itself,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> by <S%H905>themselves;<s%>

the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> by <S%H905>itself,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> by <S%H905>themselves;<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8097>Shimeites<s%> by <S%H905>itself,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> by <S%H905>themselves;<s%>
<S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> that <S%H7604>remain,<s%> <S%H4940>every<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> by <S%H905>itself,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> by <S%H905>themselves.<s%>
